verbs.description: [ARG0: FBI counterintelligence specialists] [V: briefed] [ARG1: Trump] [ARG2: about Russian intentions] [ARGM-TMP: in late July or August 2016] , [ARGM-TMP: after he officially became the Republican nominee] .
FBI counterintelligence specialists briefed Trump about Russian intentions in late July or August 2016 , after [ARG1: he] [ARGM-MNR: officially] [V: became] [ARG2: the Republican nominee] .
